name: Abyss Crawler Alpha
description:
Abyss Crawler Alpha
Goal:

Reach the deepest floor and explore the dungeon. Search for the stair in each floor to advance to the next floor. (hint: in the minimap, there's an arrow pointing to the stair)

Controls:

  • WASD Movement
  • Spacebar to Dash
  • Left Shit to Crouch (also displays collision circle)
  • Escape to pause
  • Left Mouseclick to shoot
